Package org.drip.numerical.common

Primitives/Array Manipulate Format Display
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Array2D
    Array2D the contains array of x and y.
    NumberUtil
    NumberUtil implements number utility functions.
    PrimeFactorCount
    PrimeFactorCount contains a Prime Factor and its Count in a Composite Number.
    PrimeUtil
    PrimeUtil implements Generic Prime Number Utility Functions.
    R1ClosenessVerifier
    R1ClosenessVerifier tells if a Pair of Valid R1's match to within the Absolute/Relative Tolerance.
